game.name: Hiragana Flashcards
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Learn Japanese the fun way! Progress through challenge levels, master all 71 hiragana characters, earn medals, and track your progress. Build custom decks, practice freely, and become fluent in Japan’s most common alphabet.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Learn Japanese the fun way! Progress through challenge levels, master all 71 hiragana characters, earn medals, and track your progress. Build custom decks, practice freely, and become fluent in Japan’s most common alphabet.
